General.Name: Ladangbaja Murni PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Ladang Baja Murni Tbk distributes steel products and related products in Indonesia. It trades in various steel products, including rule die steel and cutting, mold base, custom mold, and creasing rule products, as well as spare parts. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.

1.Name: Christopher Arie Lukito
1.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Unit
